content.rendered:
This is the PGP public key for Derek Zimmer. It is 4096-bit and was generated in GnuPG v2. This key was generated on 2017-03-09.

To import this key, you can either copy the text below (make sure you include the BEGIN and END lines) and paste it into a field in your application for importing, or you can paste this into a plain text file. After saving the key to a file you can import it into most of the popular PGP applications.

You can use this key to verify messages on the OSTIF.org website (that were made after the generation date above), or to send encrypted mail to Derek. You can find the email address to reach Derek at the bottom of this page. If you need the public key in the .asc file format for a specific app, email me.
